channel.title: Version 3 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 3.4.0 (2022-04-03) Break'n Break'n If ye had previously overwritten th' custom-footer.html partial t' add visual elements below th' rrrambl'n o' yer plank, ye have t' move this rrrambl'n t' th' new partial content-footer.html. custom-footer.html was never meant t' contain HTML other than additional styles an' JavaScript. New New If ye prefer expandable/collaps'ble menu items, ye can now set collapsibleMenu=true 'n yer hugo.toml. This will add arrows t' all menu items that contain sub menus. Th' menu will expand/collapse without navigat'n if ye click on an arrow.
